name: Peoplebox
description: Founded in late 2018 by Abhinav and Alagu, Peoplebox stems from their experience at a hyper-growth health-tech start-up where they witnessed rapid scaling challenges firsthand. Having seen technology's potential to streamline execution for startups and enhance focus, alignment, and results, they launched Peoplebox. The platform aims to empower hyper-growth companies with tools for effective performance management and employee engagement.
